basics.name: Javier Carrion
basics.label: Software Quality Assurance / Software Support Specialist
basics.summary: Professional with over 18 years of experience in the computer industry as a WAN/LAN technical specialist. Experience in Manual Testing for Software Quality Assurance (SQA). Background includes user support, systems installation, repair, maintenance, problem resolution, and purchasing new equipment. Proven record of success reducing down time and project time, increasing controls, and eliminating errors. Excel at creating test plans and writing/running test to pinpoint software defects, track bugs, close open defects and validate functionality. Serve as a value-adding member of QA teams. Knowledgeable in Selenium, Agile Methodology. Familiar with Object-Oriented Programming in C# .Net and Python.

work.company: QQ Solutions, Inc. a subsidiary of Vertafore, Inc.
work.summary: Identified, documented and reported bugs, errors, interoperability flaws and other issues within proprietary insurance software applications developed for QQSolutions's global user base. Worked in Agile Scrum Development Environment with frequently changing requirements and features set.
highlights: Developed and executed test plans based on business requirements and technical design documents.
Preformed manual testing extensively: System and Regression of windows based, and web based applications.
Working extensively on testing manually the GUI functionality for Software as a Service (SaaS) Agency Management System (AMS).

courses: Attended numerous professional seminars, including American Society of Travel Agents, CT Chapter.

languages.fluency: Fluent in Spanish and able to translate to English
